INVALID_EMAIL: The email address is not valid.
INVALID_PASSWORD: The password must be at least 12 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, a number, and a symbol.
INVALID_NAME: The name must have a minimum of 4 letters.
INVALID_SURNAME: The last name must have a minimum of 4 letters and spaces are allowed.
INVALID_USERNAME: The user must have a minimum of 4 characters that are letters and numbers.
